title: The Death in Sioux Lookout Trilogy
description: Chris Allard, disgraced Toronto social worker, finds work in a remote northwestern Ontario community. He is quickly embroiled in a series of murders that tax his marriage, challenge his sanity, and put him in grave peril. Unique in style, locale and characterization (and surprisingly funny) the Death in Sioux Lookout Trilogy will thrill mystery readers, or anyone familiar with the desolate beauty of the boreal forest.
author: Richard   Schwindt
